data.name: Wizards and Warlords - Support the Developer & Refreshment Sigils
data.detailed_description: Help support the solo developer behind Wizards and Warlords by getting this DLC. In addition to my gratitude, it comes with three Faction Sigils, with which to emblazon your banner or shield: A stein, a goblet and a drinking horn.
data.about_the_game: Help support the solo developer behind Wizards and Warlords by getting this DLC. In addition to my gratitude, it comes with three Faction Sigils, with which to emblazon your banner or shield: A stein, a goblet and a drinking horn.
data.short_description: Help support the solo developer behind Wizards and Warlords and get 3 new Faction Sigils: A stein, a goblet and a drinking horn.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
